root: ^Fortunately my father's journal survived the fall. Curious of it, are you?

main: ^I'm always willing to crack open the journal.

c-0: ^My father writes a tale of a young Queen emerging from an even younger Commonwealth at war with the Eastern remnants of its Warlord Era.
^Whoever she is, she wields great power both magically and politically.
c-1: ^Father writes that he believes the Queen's War to be a continuation of the Mage-King's Civil War.
^You must find his belief to be so reductivist but he was a foot soldier, not a gilded hero drenched in destiny's favor.
c-2: ^Focus on trying to get us out of this cave rather than finding a joke.
